FwkSenCnt.MEANING: the study or practice of macrobiotic diets

ExCnt.EX: I feel that macrobiotics has helped me by showing me my place in nature , which is what I feel is the essence of what Ohsawa was communicating .
I went to vegetarian cooking classes and found a small group of people teaching macrobiotics and learnt all I could .
It could also be said that there are other nutrients that can lead to deficiencies with a strict practice of macrobiotics .
